keyMoments.title: Little Oars Jr. Arrives at Marineford
keyMoments.description: Little Oars Jr., a massive giant approximately 60 meters tall, arrives at the Battle of Marineford to help save Ace from execution.
keyMoments.significance: Debut of Little Oars Jr., establishing him as a powerful ally of the Whitebeard Pirates and descendant of the legendary Oars.

keyMoments.title: Destroys Marine Ship
keyMoments.description: Little Oars Jr. demonstrates his combat power by slashing through and destroying a Marine battleship.
keyMoments.significance: Shows his formidable strength and commitment to the rescue mission.

relationships.description: Little Oars Jr. considers Ace a close friend and rushes to Marineford to save him from execution.

evolutionMoments.description: Little Oars Jr. arrives at Marineford declaring he won't let Ace die.

relationships.description: Little Oars Jr. is allied with the Whitebeard Pirates as a subordinate captain.

reveals.information: Descendant of the legendary giant Oars
Stands approximately 60 meters tall, three times larger than normal giants

keyMoments.title: Akainu Reveals Magma Powers
keyMoments.description: Admiral Akainu stands from his seat and reveals his Magu Magu no Mi Devil Fruit ability for the first time, demonstrating he can create and control magma.
keyMoments.significance: Major power reveal that establishes Akainu as one of the most dangerous combatants in the war.

keyMoments.title: First Use of Dai Funka
keyMoments.description: Akainu uses his signature technique Dai Funka to instantly evaporate Jozu's massive ice block, transforming his fist into pure magma.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the overwhelming destructive power of the Magu Magu no Mi.

keyMoments.title: Creates Volcanic Meteor Shower
keyMoments.description: Akainu's magma attack creates a massive meteor shower of volcanic rocks that rain down on the battlefield, destroying ships and igniting widespread fires.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the area-of-effect devastation possible with his powers.

abilities.description: Akainu transforms his fist into pure magma and launches it forward like an oversized rocket, burning everything in its path.
Akainu can create, control, and transform into magma at will.

reveals.information: Possesses the Magu Magu no Mi (Magma-Magma Fruit)
Can create and control magma with devastating destructive power

keyMoments.title: Marco Blocks Kizaru with Fujiazami
keyMoments.description: Marco transforms into his phoenix form and uses the Fujiazami technique to intercept and ward off Kizaru's Yasakani no Magatama attack, protecting Whitebeard.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Marco's defensive capabilities and establishes he can match an admiral in combat.

abilities.description: Marco uses his phoenix transformation to create a defensive barrier capable of blocking powerful attacks.

keyMoments.title: Jozu Hurls Massive Ice Block
keyMoments.description: Diamond Jozu breaks through the ice floor and lifts an enormous iceberg approximately ten times larger than the Marine giants, hurling it toward the admirals.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Jozu's incredible physical strength and inadvertently sets up Akainu's power reveal.

reveals.information: Possesses incredible physical strength, able to lift and throw ice blocks ten times larger than giants

keyMoments.title: Kizaru's Yasakani no Magatama
keyMoments.description: Kizaru crosses his arms and fires a devastating torrent of light particles at Whitebeard using his Yasakani no Magatama technique.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases one of Kizaru's most powerful Pika Pika no Mi techniques in direct assault.

abilities.description: Kizaru crosses his arms and fires a torrent of deadly light particles from both hands.

keyMoments.title: Koby Questions His Worth
keyMoments.description: Koby and Helmeppo witness the overwhelming power of the admirals and top fighters, questioning their own worth and abilities in this massive battle.
keyMoments.significance: Character development moment highlighting the power gap and feelings of inadequacy. This is anime-original content.

keyMoments.title: Helmeppo Questions His Worth
keyMoments.description: Helmeppo and Koby witness the overwhelming power of the admirals and top fighters, questioning their own worth and abilities in this massive battle.
keyMoments.significance: Character development moment highlighting the power gap and feelings of inadequacy. This is anime-original content.
